snippet: Italian alpine rescuers say three skiers have been killed in avalanche in the northern Italian Alps near the French border that injured another five people....

headline.main: World Cup Fans Will Need Special Identity Cards for Matches
headline.print_headline: World Cup Fans Will Need Special Identity Cards for Matches

lead_paragraph: Italian alpine rescuers say three skiers have been killed in avalanche in the northern Italian Alps near the French border that injured another five people.
